room_title: Escape room "The Rec Room" by Escape the Room Atlanta in Atlanta
review: Sooooooooooo much fun!!!!!! Makes you think outside the box! The staff was extremely nice! We have to go again because the apartment held us hostage.......we didn't escape but we're oh so close!

room_title: Escape room "The Rec Room" by Escape the Room Atlanta in Atlanta
review: We had a group of 8 in the Rec Room and absolutely loved it. We were so close. We will definitely be back. This was a birthday gift as well as Christmas gifts amongst our group. Highly recommend.

room_title: Escape room "The Rec Room" by Escape the Room Atlanta in Atlanta
review: A bunch of us did the Newsroom yesterday. We had such an amazing experience. I can't wait to try out another room! We got out with just under 2 mins to spare. So much fun!!

room_title: Escape room "The Rec Room" by Escape the Room Atlanta in Atlanta
review: Can't wait to go back! Had a great time. Very well thought out and the 80's room definitely brought back a sense of nostalgia. Everyone was very kind and helpful. Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "The Rec Room" by Escape the Room Atlanta in Atlanta
review: This was one of the best times that I've had in Atlanta in a very long time. It's a terrificly challenging, funny, mind boggling, creativity-inspiring 60 minutes that is a blast for everyone! There were seven in my group plus three strangers and we all pulled it together and almost escaped the apartment. Even in times when we didn't know what to do, we tried anything and everything to escape that room. Unfortunately we found all keys except one but will definitely be back to try the other two rooms. It's a great great great place to visit. P.S. The staff were awesome too.

room_title: Escape room "The Rec Room" by Escape the Room Atlanta in Atlanta
review: I had a blast. I went for my line sisters birrhday and wished we had more time to escape the room. We didn't win, but we came close. You really have to use your brain and think logical. I plan on going back and doing a different room.

room_title: Escape room "The Rec Room" by Escape the Room Atlanta in Atlanta
review: Great time with friends! We will go back to do the other rooms. We were in the Rec Room, which is 80s themed and right up our alley. Fun!
